Dashboard.title: Nizam - Next.js 16 Boilerplate
Dashboard.description: Open-source boilerplate for modern Next.js applications, featuring <react>React</react>, <typescript>TypeScript</typescript>, <tailwind>Tailwind CSS</tailwind>, and <tanstack>TanStack Query</tanstack>. Includes reusable components, hooks, and utilities to speed up development.

AuthSchema.usernameMin: Username must be at least 3 characters
AuthSchema.usernameRegex: Only letters, numbers and underscores are allowed
AuthSchema.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters

Features.title: Features
Features.description: Core technologies and best practices included out of the box.

appRouter.title: Next.js App Router
appRouter.description: Built on Next.js 16 App Router with file-based routing and server-first patterns for performance and simplicity.

typeSafety.title: TypeScript & Type-Safe Env
typeSafety.description: First-class TypeScript across the stack plus runtime-validated environment variables (Zod, @t3-oss/env-nextjs) for safer code and deployments.

query.title: TanStack Query
query.description: Smart caching, background revalidation, and devtools for reliable, reactive data flows—ready out of the box.

forms.title: React Hook Form & Zod
forms.description: Type-safe schemas, accessible inputs, and high-performance forms.

ui.title: Tailwind CSS & shadcn/ui
ui.description: Accessible, composable UI primitives built with Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui for rapid development and consistent design.

Showcase.title: Showcase
Showcase.description: A showcase of the features of the project.

NotFound.title: Oops! Page Not Found
NotFound.description: The page you are looking is not available or has been removed. Try going to Homepage by using the button below.
NotFound.imageAlt: Illustration of a confused person holding a broken sign

Footer.description: FixMinCykel.dk connects cyclists with trusted local workshops for quick, reliable bike repairs and services. Book online, chat with providers, and get back on the road faster.

LoginSchema.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
LoginSchema.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters

RegisterSchema.fullNameMin: Full name must be at least 2 characters
RegisterSchema.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
RegisterSchema.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number
RegisterSchema.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters

Hero.title: Upload your bike issue. Get offers. Book repair.
Hero.subtitle: Find local bike repair shops, compare offers, and book a repair in minutes.

HowItWorksHero.title: About FixMinCykel.dk
HowItWorksHero.subtitle: We make bicycle repairs simple by connecting cyclists with nearby workshops—submit your issue, receive offers, and book a repair in minutes.

HowItWorksVision.title: A modern way to get your bike fixed
HowItWorksVision.body: FixMinCykel.dk is a platform built to reduce the hassle of finding the right bicycle repair shop. Instead of calling around, you can send one request and let workshops come back with offers.

HowItWorksSteps.title: Everything in one place
HowItWorksSteps.subtitle: Create a request, compare offers, and book with confidence in a few simple steps.

create.title: Create request
create.description: Submit a short description and photos of the issue.

offers.title: Get offers
offers.description: Receive offers from workshops near you.

chat.title: Chat
chat.description: Clarify details before confirming the repair.

book.title: Book
book.description: Pick a time that works and confirm the job.

review.title: Review
review.description: Complete the repair and leave feedback.

describe.title: Describe
describe.description: Tell us what’s wrong with your bike in a few words—flat tire, noisy brakes, gear slipping, or anything else. Add photos if you can, and include details like bike type (road, MTB, e-bike), urgency, and preferred time. The more you share, the faster workshops can understand the issue and send accurate offers

receive.title: Receive
receive.description: Nearby workshops review your request and send you offers based on your description and photos. You’ll see clear pricing (fixed price or estimate), expected repair time, and what’s included. Compare ratings, response speed, and workshop specialties—so you can feel confident you’re choosing the right place for your bike.
receive.imageAlt: Mechanic working on a bicycle wheel

choose.title: Choose
choose.description: Pick the offer that fits your budget, timing, and quality expectations—then book instantly. You can message the workshop to ask questions before confirming, and you’ll receive booking details right away. After the repair, you can rate the service and help other riders find trusted workshops.

NewsTipsMaintenance.title: News, tips & maintenance
NewsTipsMaintenance.subtitle: Quick reads to keep your bike running smooth, safe, and ready for the next ride.
NewsTipsMaintenance.ctaAria: See all news, tips and maintenance

maintenanceBasics.title: Bike Maintenance Basics
maintenanceBasics.description: Keep your ride smooth with simple routine care like tire pressure checks, chain cleaning, and quick bolt inspections.

flatTireFast.title: Fix a Flat Tire Fast
flatTireFast.description: Step-by-step tips and when it makes sense to book a workshop instead.

brakeProblems.title: Brake Problems Explained
brakeProblems.description: Squeaks, rubbing, or soft braking can signal worn pads or dirty rotors. Learn the quick checks and safe fixes.

ebikeCare.title: E-Bike Care & Battery Tips
ebikeCare.description: Charge smart, store safely, and extend battery life with simple habits that protect your e-bike.

tuneUpTime.title: Best Time for a Tune-Up
tuneUpTime.description: Hear new noises or feel rough shifting? This checklist helps you catch small issues before they become costly repairs.

chooseWorkshop.title: Choosing the Right Workshop
chooseWorkshop.description: Compare pricing, response time, and service quality to book with confidence and get the right fix.

Explore.title: Explore
Explore.articleTitle: How to Prepare Your Bike for the Danish Winter
Explore.articleDescription: Master the art of winter maintenance and keep your gear running smoothly through the salt, slush, and snow of the Nordics.
Explore.imageAlt: Cyclist riding a bike in winter conditions

homeRepair.title: Quick Home Repair Wins for Busy Riders
homeRepair.imageAlt: Minimalist bicycle leaning against a wall

workshopSetup.title: Workshop Setup Tips for Faster Fixes
workshopSetup.imageAlt: Mechanic working on a bike in a workshop

essentialTools.title: 5 Essential Tools for Home Repair
essentialTools.description: The ultimate guide for the hobbyist mechanic looking to save money and maintain their ride at home.

homeRepairGuide.title: Workshop-Ready Home Repair Guide
homeRepairGuide.description: Create a clean workspace, keep tools organized, and make fixes faster with simple routines.

winterSetup.title: Winter Setup Checklist for Safer Rides
winterSetup.description: From lights to tires, prepare your bike for dark mornings and slippery streets.

workshopUpgrades.title: Quick Workshop Upgrades That Save Time
workshopUpgrades.description: Small changes that speed up diagnostics, reduce rework, and improve customer handoffs.

Faq.title: FAQs
Faq.subtitle: Quick answers to the most common questions about FixMinCykel.dk.

repairCost.question: How much does a repair cost?
repairCost.answer: Pricing depends on the repair type and bike model. Submit your issue to receive fixed-price offers before you book.

workshopResponse.question: How fast do workshops respond?
workshopResponse.answer: Most workshops reply within a few hours during business days. You will be notified as soon as offers arrive.

supportedCities.question: What cities are supported?
supportedCities.answer: FixMinCykel.dk is expanding across Denmark. Enter your location to see workshops near you.

supportedBikes.question: Which bikes are supported (e-bike, cargo bike, etc.)?
supportedBikes.answer: We support city bikes, road bikes, mountain bikes, cargo bikes, and e-bikes. Share details in your request so workshops can match parts.

ClientFaq.title: Ask us anything
ClientFaq.subtitle: Have any questions? We're here to assist you.

accountEmail.question: How do I change my account email?
accountEmail.answer: You can log in to your account and change it from your Profile > Edit Profile. Then go to the General tab to change your email.

paymentFails.question: What should I do if my payment fails?
paymentFails.answer: If your payment fails, you can use the (COD) payment option, if available on that order. If your payment is debited from your account after a payment failure, it will be credited back within 7-10 days.

cancellation.question: What is your cancellation policy?
cancellation.answer: You can now cancel an order when it is in packed/shipped status. Any amount paid will be credited into the same payment mode using which the payment was made.

deliveryStatus.question: How do I check order delivery status?
deliveryStatus.answer: Please tap on "My Orders" section under main menu of App/Website/M-site to check your order status.

instantRefunds.question: What is Instant Refunds?
instantRefunds.answer: Upon successful pickup of the return product at your doorstep, Myntra will instantly initiate the refund to your source account or chosen method. Instant Refunds are not available in a few select pin codes and for all self-ship returns.

applyCoupon.question: How do I apply a coupon on my order?
applyCoupon.answer: You can apply a coupon on cart page before order placement. The complete list of your unused and valid coupons will be available under "My Coupons" tab of App/Website/M-site.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.subtitle: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Please chat to our friendly team.
